class app.models.User(username, password, email='', active=True)[source]¶

Bases: flask_sqlalchemy.Model, flask_user.UserMixin

Site-wide User model :param int id: unique user id :param str username: The name of the User :param str password: The User’s password :param bool active: Is this user’s account enabled? :param str email: The User’s email
